title: Greater Albion Typefounders Has a Website-Sort Of!
content:
Greater Albion Typefounders is now approaching the end of its second month selling through Myfonts.com. We've taken the next big step-setting up a web presence. For the moment this takes the form of a Wordpress Blog where new releases will be announced-and the odd sneak preview given...

We can be found at [http://gatf.wordpress.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013144225/http:/gatf.wordpress.com/ "http://gatf.wordpress.com/")

We hope to develop a full website soon, but for the moment we're all tied up working on the next couple new new releases...
author: Rasendyll
